recipes.name: Pancakes
recipes.instructions: Put the flour, eggs, milk, 1 tbsp oil and a pinch of salt into a bowl or large jug, then whisk to a smooth batter. Set aside for 30 mins to rest if you have time, or start cooking straight away. Set a medium frying pan or crêpe pan over medium heat and carefully wipe it with some oiled kitchen paper. When hot, cook your pancakes for 1 min on each side until golden, keeping them warm in a low oven. Serve with lemon wedges and sugar or your favourite filling.

recipes.name: Chicken Handi
recipes.instructions: Take a large pot or wok, big enough to cook all the chicken, and heat the oil in it. Once the oil is hot, add sliced onion and fry until deep golden brown. Set aside. In the same pot, add chopped garlic and sauté for a minute. Then add chopped tomatoes and cook until soft. Return fried onion, add ginger paste, sauté, then add cumin seeds, half coriander seeds, and green chilies. Add spices, sauté for a couple of minutes, then add chicken, season with salt, and cook until almost done. When oil separates, add beaten yogurt, cream, and remaining coriander and fenugreek leaves. Mix well and serve hot with naan or rotis.

recipes.name: Sushi
recipes.instructions: To make sushi rolls, pat out rice, lay a nori sheet on a mat, dip hands in vinegared water, and pat rice on top, leaving one edge clear. Spread Japanese mayonnaise, add filling, roll tightly, and slice. For pressed sushi, layer smoked salmon in a loaf tin, cover with rice, and press down. For sushi balls, use cling film to wrap rice around toppings.

recipes.name: Pizza Express Margherita
recipes.instructions: Preheat oven to 230°C. Add sugar and crumble fresh yeast into warm water, let froth. Sift flour and salt into a bowl, pour in yeast mixture and olive oil. Mix until binding, knead for 10 minutes. Place in a baking tray, spread passata, add mozzarella, oregano, black pepper, drizzle olive oil. Cook for 10-12 minutes, top with basil before serving.

recipes.name: Spaghetti Carbonara
recipes.instructions: Cook spaghetti in salted boiling water until al dente. Fry pancetta until crispy. In a bowl, beat eggs, mix in Parmesan, combine with drained pasta and pancetta, and serve immediately.

recipes.name: Beef Stroganoff
recipes.instructions: Slice beef into thin strips, sauté onions and mushrooms in butter. Sear beef, add onions, mushrooms, sour cream, season, and serve over rice or noodles.

recipes.name: Chicken Caesar Salad
recipes.instructions: Grill chicken breasts, slice, and toss with romaine lettuce, Caesar dressing, croutons, and Parmesan cheese. Serve immediately.

recipes.name: Vegetable Stir Fry
recipes.instructions: Chop vegetables and stir-fry with oil, soy sauce, garlic, and ginger. Serve over rice or noodles.

recipes.name: Lamb Curry
recipes.instructions: Brown lamb in oil, set aside. Cook onions, garlic, ginger, add curry powder, return lamb, add coconut milk, and simmer. Serve with rice.

recipes.name: Fish Tacos
recipes.instructions: Season fish with chili powder, cumin, and salt. Cook in a hot pan, serve in tortillas with cabbage, avocado, and salsa.

recipes.name: Caprese Salad
recipes.instructions: Layer fresh mozzarella, tomatoes, and basil. Drizzle with olive oil and balsamic vinegar, season with salt and pepper.

recipes.name: Chili con Carne
recipes.instructions: Brown ground beef with onions, add garlic, tomatoes, kidney beans, chili powder, and simmer. Serve hot.

recipes.name: Mushroom Risotto
recipes.instructions: Sauté onions, add Arborio rice, gradually add broth while stirring until creamy. Stir in mushrooms and cheese before serving.

recipes.name: Lentil Soup
recipes.instructions: Cook lentils with diced vegetables, garlic, and seasonings until tender. Serve hot.
